search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Crisp (crisp.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Crisp can be found at: [https://crisp.chat/en/pricing/](https://crisp.chat/en/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Pricing and plans - best deals - Crisp

extracted_content.content:
Try any plan for free for 14 days
---------------------------------

Every new account unlocks full access to all Crisp features, letting you explore and see if we’re the right fit for your needs.

*   What's included:
    
    You + a colleague can chat with customers.
    
    ![Image 1: pricing-hero-plans-plan-benefit-icon-key_default](https://crisp.chat/_ipx/s_18x18/components/pricing/PricingHeroPlans/benefit_key_default.svg)2 seats included
    
    A user profile is created when an email is linked to a conversation, allowing unlimited conversations per profile, from any channel.
    
    ![Image 2: pricing-hero-plans-plan-benefit-icon-users_default](https://crisp.chat/_ipx/s_18x18/components/pricing/PricingHeroPlans/benefit_users_default.svg)100 user profiles included
    
    Engage with people that are browsing your website and get closer to your customers.

    *   Let artificial intelligence classify your conversations automatically.
        
        Topic tags
        
    *   Get access to a conversations' summary everytime you need to.
        
        Conversations' summary
        
    *   Unlock all the data sources you need to create the most advanced AI custom model.
        
        Advanced internal AI data training
        
    *   Let your users use AI-powered search to get an answer before they contact your support.
        
        Overlay search
        
    *   Your support agents can ask questions to an internal AI chat, trained on your internal data.
        
        Inbox assistant
        
    *   Get immediate voice-to-text transcription for every audio message or recorded phone calls.
        
        Voice-to-text
        
    *   Gain access to a custom spam filter powered by AI that gets trained based on your settings.
        
        Advanced spam filter

### A flat pricing per workspace, not per agent

At Crisp, we offer a straightforward and easy-to-understand pricing model with a flat rate per workspace, not per agent. This means you pay a single, consistent price regardless of the number of agents you have on your team. Our approach ensures that you can scale your customer support operations without worrying about rising costs per agent. With Crisp, you get all the essential tools and features your team needs to provide exceptional customer service, all included in one simple, predictable subscription. Simplify your budgeting and focus on what matters most – growing your business and delighting your customers.

![Image 63: pricing-flat-illustration](https://crisp.chat/_ipx/_/components/pricing/PricingFlat/chart.svg)

[Enterprise](https://crisp.chat/en/pricing/#enterprise)

Need something more custom?
---------------------------

### Enterprise

Created for large-scale companies willing to benefit from dedicated features, custom onboarding and personalized SLAs.

*   Dedicated onboarding
*   Personalized SLA
*   Enhanced rate limits
*   Custom features
*   Unique pricing
*   Team training

Ask for a demo

![Image 64: pricing-enterprise-illustration](https://crisp.chat/_ipx/w_2800&f_png&q_90/common/characters/woman_with_robot.webp)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Crisp offers a flat pricing model per workspace, not per agent, with additional features available for enterprise customers.
